name: Evil Red Squares
description:
A top down survival shooter, inspired by diep.io. Play as a blue circle (tank) and fend off the evil red squares as they attempt to kill you.

Earn points for each enemy killed and try to survive as long as possible.

Find yellow Supers around the map that can be fired at the enemies to kill enemies in an area.

I made this game in a short amount of time to try to improve my skills with unity, I hope people can enjoy playing this to pass the time.

Play in full screen.

Controls:

WASD: Up, Left, Down, Right

Mouse: Aim

Mouse-Left-Click: Shoot

Space: Fire Super
